name: Chrysopoeian Crisis
Description: The members of the alchemy guild are secretive and difficult to work with. Can you convince them to let you join their guild?

flags.name: Quest Start
flags.description: Oikaaz advised you to visit the Alchemist's Guild in Tsu City to learn alchemy from a teacher.

flags.name: Guild Membership Requested
flags.description: You asked Linehart Wichperger if you could join the alchemists guild.

flags.name: Linehart's Request
flags.description: Linehart Wichperger asked you to plant poison in Hadeas Tajek's room.

flags.name: Agreed To Frame
flags.description: You agreed to plant poison in Hadeas Tajek's room.

flags.name: Hadeas Confronted
flags.description: You confronted Hadeas Tajek about the previous headmaster.

flags.name: Hadeas' Request
flags.description: Hadeas Tajek has asked you to get Linehart kicked out of the guild.

flags.name: Agreed To Hadeas
flags.description: You agreed to try to get Linehart kicked out of the guild.
